author: Ian Millard
comment: The app has just advised me that soon I will have to upgrade my version of Android to keep using it. Not real happy about that as Samsung hasn't released an update for my Galaxy S2. Please make the app suitable for 4.4.2 and above.

author: Zacariah Haese
comment: This app is useless. It does not work. It worked off and on for a week when I first got it. But now all I ever get is an error:500 cannot connect with Aus post. I've emailed 3 or 4 times and heard nothing back. Crappy app with crappy support

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Zacariah,

Sorry to hear that you are having problems, could you please provide further details such as screenshots of the bugs to mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au and we’ll look further into it.

– The AusPost App team

comment: Was reasonably happy with this app until i was notified that it will no longer support android 4.4.2 - there are no official updates for my variant of the galaxy j1 and im not replacing my perfectly adiquate phone for 1 app

author: Shane Rosengren
comment: Love this app allows to track deliveries and is pretty spot o

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Shane, 

Thanks for the 5 star review! We're happy to hear that the app is working well for you!

–The AusPost App Team

comment: I doalot of online shopping, so this app is really handy to have. I can tell when most of my packages are due for delivery.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi, 

Thanks for taking the time to review us! We're glad to see that you are liking the app!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Benjamin Blackwood
comment: Love using this to track my parcels, being able to enter a nickname, and getting push notifications when it's automatically added to my account!

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Benjamin, 

We're happy to hear you are loving the app! Thanks for the positive review!

–The AusPost App Team

author: James Slade
comment: Does everything I need a post app to do and More.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi James,

Thanks for the positive review! Glad you are enjoying the app!

–The AusPost App Team

author: David Westrope
comment: Has been a blessing as we are Mobil, so perfect for redirecting when needed.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi David, 

Glad to hear the app is making your delivery experience better! Thanks for the positive review!

–The AusPost App Team

author: dave mckenna
comment: Effectively updates you on the progress of your delivery.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Dave, 

Thanks for taking the time to positively review us! We're glad to hear you are liking our services!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Adam Atom
comment: Great layout and functional. Lots of useful info.
Great at keeping up to date.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi,

We're happy to hear that you are enjoying our services. Thanks for the 5 star review!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Wayne Underwood
comment: Great app. Very useful

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Wayne, 

Thanks for the 5 star rating! We appreciate the time taken to review us!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Adam Chander
comment: Great app to track postage

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Adam, 

Thanks for the positive review! We're glad the app is improving your delivery experience!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Prashan Attanayaka
comment: Best App Ever 😍

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Prashan, 

Thanks for the 5 star review, we're really happy that you are loving our app!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Jan Profant
comment: Great app.

author: Dave Gray
comment: Works for me fine

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Dave,

Thanks for the positive review! We're glad the app has been working well for you.

– The AusPost App team

author: Karine Davis
comment: I absolutely love this App! I started using on an IOS device and then moved to Android with a seamless experience. I love that I can track my parcels and see exactly where they are on their journey to me. I have not experienced any difficulties. It is great being able to  select safe drop, right from the App and knowing when my parcels will be arriving (so I can plan for someone to be at home). 5 stars all the way!

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Karine, 

Thanks for your wonderful words! We love that you love our app! 

–The AusPost App Team

author: Juicy Boi
comment: I really like this app if it would work properly. I have connection issues every single time it opens it has connection issues to aus post. I then have to refresh until it finally updates my tracking numbers. Ive stood at a parcel locker for 10min once trying to get it to connect so i could get the code

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi,

Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear that you were having problems, those issues should have been resolved by now. If you are still experiencing issues please do not hesitate to email us at mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au and we will investigate further.

– The AusPost App team

author: Tin BUI
comment: The process of retrieving the parcel at the locker is already good.  But but app make that even better. I no longer have to remember to type in the mobile number and the code. So very handy. It's one of the first apps I've been installing on my new phones.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Tin, 

Glad to hear the app is making your delivery experience quicker and easier! Thanks for all your kind words!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Sarah Thomson
comment: Since last update all tracking 'gets stuck' on one status then fully updates when the parcel has already been delivered. Was not like this until  I updated the app other day. A bit frustrating, as I do want to see when to actually except the delivery.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Sarah,

Sorry to hear that you are having problems. Could you please provide further details such as the tracking numbers which have given you these issues to mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au and we’ll look further into it. 

– The AusPost App team

author: Faye Valentine
comment: Pathetic app. Don't even bother wasting data to download. It doesn't update at all and there's absolutely no tracking info other than the first log. What's the point of the app if it isn't going to track the item?? The app is a TRACKING app that DOESNT TRACK

author: Rosie J
comment: It is really useful but only when it's working properly - it frequently shows wrong or out of date information. For example I'll get a text saying my parcel is ready for collection, but the app will still show that it's on its way even after pulling down to update. Then you pick up the parcel and the app still shows its on its way for a couple of days, then flicks to 'ready for collection' or 'delivered'.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Rosie, 

Sorry to hear that you had a poor experience, could you please provide more details such as your tracking numbers to mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au so that we can look into this issue. 

– The AusPost App team

author: Luke Dang
comment: Fantastic app has showen me heaps of features and services I never knew Australia Post hard. Shame that some of their postman ah lazy and can't even be bothered to knock  on your door. Instead they just write a little slip and drive off as fast as possible.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Luke, 

We're happy to hear the app is improving your delivery experience! We're working hard to improve all aspects of our services! Thanks for the 5 star review!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Matthew Halliday
comment: App has generally worked pretty great however for the last few weeks the tracking has stopped updating. For example, items I have already received are still marked as "In Transit", making the tracking component, the main reason I use this app, pointless

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Matthew, 

We understand when the app isn't working correctly can be frustrating. Unfortunately the tracking service makes mistakes from time to time due to human error, we are working to reduce these errors as much as we can in the future.

–The AusPost App Team

author: Was Ear
comment: It is helpful but says "the parcel is coming", when only the shipping information has been lodged. This is misleading. It should say "shipping information lodged" and then when the parcel is received by AP, it should say "your parcel is on its way". There generally a number of days between shipping info and lodgement at AP

author: Louise King
comment: I love this app! I like being able to  check my parcels location at any time. Also, tells me when it's been delivered or collected! Thanks Australia Post!

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Louise,

Thanks for the rating! We really appreciate you taking the time to give us this positive review.

– The AusPost App team

comment: Works well to pick up all of my deliveries and have had no issues with parcels getting stuck. Integration with parcel lockers is easy and redirection works well. Great app!

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi,
 
Thank you for your review, we are really happy to hear that you are enjoying the app and using it well alongside Parcel Lockers.
 
– The AusPost App team

author: Penelope Pitstopp
comment: This app as with most alerts with Aus Post is a bit hit and miss. I'm  always pleasantly surprised  when it works.

author: Catherine Metcalf
comment: Once upon a time this app was 100% the BEST thing ever but now its a useless space eater. Nevee updates to 'delivered' or even 'coming today' often is stuck on 'we have got it'... useless

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Catherine,

Sorry to hear that you are having problems, have you tried to pull down to refresh the data on the track screen? In order to find out whether this is a technical problem could you please send further details such as tracking numbers to mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au and we'll look into it.

The AusPost App team

author: michael slattery
comment: Tracking by australia post is poor and doesnt update location whats the point  of paying to track parcel when it doesnt show true location of parcel seriously either drivers not scanning  parcels when they recieve and dropping off to the next location in the delivery stage or your whole tracking system flawed and need a overhaul

author: Tracey Symons
comment: I am bed bound due to Disability and I had a parcel come today and it was just a toy but it had to be signed for, My Carer arrived 10 minutes later.  I'm not happy as I have had more important items that have been left at my front door in a secure spot.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Tracey,

Thanks for the 5 star rating! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying the app.

– The AusPost App team

author: Shannon Hirini
comment: Only problem I have is the package on its way detail which could mean anything from today to a few days. Other than that it's really good.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Shannon Hirini,

Thanks for the review. Please check the detailed tracking section at the bottom of the tracking page as this should provide sufficient tracking details if the sender of the item has opted for tracking.

– The AusPost App team

author: Jacob Ian Matthews
comment: Great so far! There are a few things that open up in Chrome/browser that should be moved to be inside the app, but otherwise I like it!

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Jacob,

Thanks for taking the time to rate us. These are changes that we are already considering for future updates. Thanks for the suggestions!

– The AusPost App team

author: Chris Cuddy
comment: Still is total rubbish. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling. Can't connect to servers. Constant error messages and STILL can't display any of my items. seems to be the way with Auspost more money for poorer service.

author: Ken V
comment: Since I got no help through Twitter and Facebook. I thought I asked here? Why is there is different time frames for picking up parcels over the counter? Every email I got only mentioned 5 days. Why is it every single time you sign into your account you get the same information with no way of deleting the information for example telling you about parcel lockers when you are already a customer of parcel lockers, why do Australia Post staff block you on Twitter and ignore you on Facebook when all you wanted was to find out the truth like the difference time frames to pick up parcels etc

author: Tania R
comment: Love the App, if you are an online purchaser it really does simplify tracking & status. The only frustrations I have experienced with Aust Post was not the App it was human error.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Tania, 

Happy to hear the app is helping you out! Thanks for the 5 star review!

–The AusPost App Team

author: Angus Gibbins
comment: The app itself is fine but Australia Post consistently provides customers with a terrible level of customer service. Any other business would be broke by now.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Angus, 

We're glad to hear you like the app, however if you received some negative customer service we'd like to hear about it so we can do better next time! If you email us at mypostfeedback@auspost.com.au with some details, we'll investigate for you.

–The AusPost App Team

author: Alexander Nilon
comment: Great way to keep an eye on deliveries, especially to parcel lockers. Occasionally the delivery schedule will be inaccurate, but it's great to know just how far off a delivery is.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi Alexander, 

Glad to hear the app is improving your delivery experience! Thanks for your review! 

–The AusPost App Team

author: Andy Keyte
comment: Good but status descripions could be clearer for parcel locker collection. Some deliveries don't automatically register while in transit - they appear when delivered.
Great user interface. Connection issues sometimes but could be related to internet connection. Easy to use, and is very informative on Australia Post's available services.

reply.author: Australia Post Digital
reply.content:
Hi,

We are glad to hear you like the design of the app. Thank you for your positive rating.
 
– The AusPost App team
